What is Community Walk?

Community Walks are local walk events with an emphasis on fundraising and diabetes awareness and planned by volunteers just like you!

Learn More

Interested in coordinating a Community Walk?

Are you passionate about stopping diabetes? If there isn't a Step Out: Walk to Stop Diabetes in near you, you could plan your own walk event!

Learn More

Find a Community Walk near you!

Community Walks are popping up from coast-to-coast. Check out what's happening near you!

Learn More

Enter your zip to get started!

Featured Walk

On October 30th, please join the Deken Family in Continental, Ohio as they honor their mom at Jane's Crazy Spooktacular Walk! For more info and to register, click on "Learn More."

Learn More

What We Do

Fundraising is key to Stopping Diabetes! Thank you to all Community Walk supporters and sharing our vision of a life free from diabetes and all its burdens.

Contact Us

  If you have any questions at all about Community Walk to Stop Diabetes, please do not hesitate to contact us at communitywalk@diabetes.org or click here. We will do everything we can to answer your questions and we look forward to hearing from you!

  If you have general questions about the American Diabetes Association or diabetes, view more contact options here.
